title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 100.1 - Employment of police officers in licensed premises
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 100.1 - Employment of police officers in licensed premises

State Regulations
(a) A police officer employed in this State, having written permission and consent from his commanding officer, may work in
a premises licensed to sell beer at retail for off-premises consumption under
section
54
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control

Law. (b) A copy of such written
consent shall be kept on the licensed premises throughout the period of
employment of such police officer in such licensed premises. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
100.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
